FormEncode CommunityÂ¶

Discussion takes place on the mailing list, formencode-discuss@lists.sf.net:

  • Subcribe
  • Archives

Updates to the repository are emailed to the (inaccurately named) mailing list formencode-cvs@lists.sf.net:

  • Subscribe

The repository can be checked out with:

hg clone http://bitbucket.org/ianb/formencode

Note: the SourceForge CVS repository and svn.colorstudy.com Subversion repositories are out of date and no longer used.

Bugs can be reported in the SourceForge bug tracker.
